verses.verse: Not to <S%H3068>us,<s%> Yahweh, not to <S%H8034>us,<s%> but to your name <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory,<s%> for your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> and for your <S%H571>truth<s%>'s sake.
Why should the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "Where is their <S%H430>God,<s%> now?"
But our <S%H430>God<s%> is in the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%> He <S%H6213>does<s%> whatever he <S%H2654>pleases.<s%>
They have <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> but they <S%H1696>don't<s%> speak. They have <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but they <S%H7200>don't<s%> see.
They have <S%H241>ears,<s%> but they <S%H8085>don't<s%> hear. They have <S%H639>noses,<s%> but they <S%H7306>don't<s%> smell.
They have <S%H3027>hands,<s%> but they <S%H4184>don't<s%> feel. They have <S%H7272>feet,<s%> but they <S%H1980>don't<s%> walk, neither do they <S%H1897>speak<s%> through their <S%H1627>throat.<s%>
Those who <S%H6213>make<s%> them will be like <S%H982>them;<s%> yes, everyone who trusts in them.
<S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> He is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield.<s%>
<S%H1004>House<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> He is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield.<s%>
You who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> He is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2142>remembers<s%> <S%H1288>us.<s%> He will bless <S%H1288>us.<s%> He will bless the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> He will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>
He will <S%H1288>bless<s%> those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great.<s%>
May <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3254>increase<s%> you more and <S%H1121>more,<s%> you and your children.
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> but the <S%H776>earth<s%> has he <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
The <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H1984>don't<s%> praise <S%H3050>Yah,<s%> neither any who go <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H1745>silence;<s%>
But we will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3050>Yah,<s%> from this time forth and <S%H5704>forevermore.<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3050>Yah!<s%>
